Key Match Events: Pakistan won by 7 wickets against Bangladesh in the 31st match of the 2023 Cricket World Cup
Pakistan chased down the target in just 32 overs, losing three wickets along the way
Fakhar Zaman was the top scorer for Pakistan with 81 runs
Mahmudullah was the top scorer for Bangladesh with 56 runs
Shaheen Afridi and Mohammad Wasim picked up three wickets each for Pakistan
Fakhar Zaman was adjudged the Player of the Match
